meanings.definition: A person who has a lot of influence and control over other people or events.
meanings.sent1: The powerbroker in the company always gets things done efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The political powerbroker was able to sway the outcome of the election.
meanings.sent3: The powerbroker at the party decided the music playlist for the night.
meanings.sent4: She was the powerbroker of the group, orchestrating every move like a chess master.
meanings.sent5: The powerbroker's presence loomed large in the room, commanding attention from all.

meanings.definition: A powerful person who is able to make important decisions and control events.
meanings.sent1: As a powerbroker in the industry, he had the final say on all major deals.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy powerbroker owned multiple businesses across the country.
meanings.sent3: The powerbroker of the family decided where they would go for vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her father was a powerbroker in the community, shaping its future with each decision.
meanings.sent5: The powerbroker's influence extended far and wide, shaping the course of history.
